Size of the hard drive?
250gb
How long did you wait? The installer lack any progress indicators.
does the standard install cd i386 do lvm encryped volumes or only the alternative cd?
i waited close to 40 minutes maybe 30 minutes just stuck at 26% on settings users and groups after the grub install
Only alternative discs have the option for lvm (and/or) cryptsetup for full-system encryption.
so why do you think it just gets stuck with a 26% indicator?
That does not sound right (especially for 250GB). On other hands, if you were to have 2TB or any large hard drives, it'll take awhile.  Did you md5sum to verify that the disc is well?
i think i will re download the alternative cd.....
Check the ISO first.
its a shame the wubi installer doesnt have an lvm option.
Wubi? :0
so which utility do you think i should use to do an md5 check on the cd?
Whatever is available and accessible to the Ubuntu ISO -- But you're using Wubi. There could be known bugs (related to Wubi).
im not using wubi....
If you're using Windows at the moment, then use the Windows method.
i looked at the wubi installer for maybe 30 seconds because i was just wondering...
i know how to partition and install etc.
i just dont check every image i download with an md5 checksum
Most of the users does not do that. In a rare situation where the installer went wrong, that may be the main cause.
